name: STATE FARM MUTUAL AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE COMPANY, Petitioner, v. Margaret Mary KREEB and Gary James Kreeb, Respondent
name_abbreviation: State Farm Mutual Automobile Insurance v. Kreeb

parties: STATE FARM MUTUAL AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE COMPANY, Petitioner, v. Margaret Mary KREEB and Gary James Kreeb, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 24th day of August 2000, the petition for allowance of appeal is GRANTED, the decision of the Superior Court is REVERSED. See Winslow-Quattlebaum v. Maryland Insurance Group and Zurich Personal Insurance, 561 Pa. 629, 752 A.2d 878 (2000).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
757 A.2d 366
STATE FARM MUTUAL AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE COMPANY, Petitioner, v. Margaret Mary KREEB and Gary James Kreeb, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 24, 2000.
